body:
##### Modifications
- [x] makes it possible (again) to build OpenMPI without Fortran
- [x] warn the user if building without a fortran compiler
- [x]  build_environment : sets `CC`, `CXX` and similar variables only if a compiler is found
##### Notes

Raising an install error we effectively renounce at : 

```
spack install openmpi%clang
```

Concerning the other part of #1079 : did anybody try [this](https://github.com/xianyi/OpenBLAS/issues/520)  ?
title: OpenMPI : reverts part of #1079
